name: ROBOTS RUMBLE
description: Somekind of arcade-puzzle-plataformer made with ADG. In this game you have to guide the robot to the latest screen of each planet and throw it into the lava. You control the robot with the right and left magnets. Avoid green radioactive rocks and guardians. You need to recharge your energy picking up the batteries. Keys: Q-A Up-Down left magnet. P-L Up-Down right magnet. Load in 128k for music (Giorgio Moroder, Kraftwerk...)
